  • piper.Piper.calc_Ppc

piper.Piper.calc_Ppc#

Piper.calc_Ppc(sg=None, H2S=None, CO2=None, N2=None, J=None, K=None, Tpc=None, ignore_conflict=False)[source]#

Calculates pseudo-critical pressure, Ppc (psia)

Parameters:

  • sg (float) – specific gravity of gas (dimensionless)

  • H2S (float) – mole fraction of H2S (dimensionless)

  • CO2 (float) – mole fraction of CO2 (dimensionless)

  • N2 (float) – mole fraction of N2 (dimensionless)

  • J (float) – SBV parameter, J, (°R/psia)

  • K (float) – SBV parameter, K, (°R/psia^0.5)

  • Tpc (float) – pseudo-critical temperature, Tpc (°R)

  • ignore_conflict (bool) – set this to True to override calculated variables with input keyword arguments.

Returns:

pseudo-critical pressure, Ppc (psia)

Return type:

float

piper.Piper.calc_Tpc

piper.Piper.calc_Tr
